original_title: Thomas & Friends: Thomas & the Special Letter
overview: Take a trip to Sodor where the sun always shines and storms never last very long. A bad-tempered steamroller, named George, is convinced that roads are much more important then the rails. Welcome Skarloey back home, and watch as Oliver and Toad teach a really useful lesson to some of the troublesome trucks.
title: Thomas & Friends: Thomas & the Special Letter
